title: AI-driven Healthcare Diagnostic System
description: Developing an artificial intelligence system that assists medical professionals in diagnosing diseases using medical imaging data and patient records. The project focuses on improving diagnostic accuracy while maintaining interpretability for clinical use.

title: Cross-lingual Natural Language Processing
description: Researching methods to enable natural language processing systems to work effectively across multiple languages, with a special focus on low-resource languages. This includes developing transfer learning techniques and multilingual models.

title: Knowledge Graph Construction and Reasoning
description: Building large-scale knowledge graphs from unstructured text and developing reasoning algorithms to answer complex queries. The project aims to create systems that can understand and reason about relationships between entities.

title: Efficient Large Language Model Training
description: Investigated novel approaches for training and fine-tuning large language models more efficiently, reducing computational costs while maintaining or improving performance. Developed parameter-efficient fine-tuning methods.

title: Multimodal Learning for Vision and Language
description: Explored methods for combining visual and textual information to solve tasks such as visual question answering, image captioning, and visual reasoning. Successfully developed fusion architectures that improved state-of-the-art performance.
